directions: Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer. Bring water to a boil. Add sweet potato, cover, and steam until tender, 5 to 7 minutes.
Place avocado in a bowl; add olive oil, salt-free seasoning blend, garlic powder, and black pepper and stir to coat. Gently stir sweet potato into avocado mixture; top with Parmesan cheese.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon salt-free seasoning blend (such as Mrs. Dash®)
title: Sweet Potato and Avocado Salad
